snippet: The court found that Nicaragua had violated Costa Rica’s territorial sovereignty by establishing a military camp and digging channels near the mouth of the San Juan River.
lead_paragraph: The court found that Nicaragua had violated Costa Rica’s territorial sovereignty by establishing a military camp and digging channels near the mouth of the San Juan River.

headline.main: International Court Sides With Costa Rica in Dispute With Nicaragua
headline.print_headline: International Court Sides With Costa Rica in Dispute With Nicaragua
